Sequence Information.Peptide Name: BmK AS (Beta-toxin BmKAS; BmK-AS; BmK-PL; natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 4S=S; UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 39.4% similar toBact2. Active against S. aureus CMCC (B) 26003 (MIC 10 uM); S. typhimurium CMCC (B) 50094; E. coli CMCC (B) 44102;  P. aeruginosa CMCC (B) 10104 (MIC 4.5-5 uM). The MIC values are proportional to inhibition zone size (8-11 mm).  Provided by Xiuqing Wang.
Literature Information.Author: Shao JH1, Wang YQ, Wu XY, Jiang R, Zhang R, Wu CF, Zhang JH. 2008
Literature Information.Title: Cloning, expression, and pharmacological activity of BmK AS, an active peptide from scorpion Buthus martensii Karsch
